about_me.name: Jesper
about_me.title: Software Developer
about_me.introduction: Former film production professional, specializing as a certified drone operator and editor. Currently, I'm pursuing a degree in Informatics at NTNU, complemented by courses in Economy and Management. Born in Trondheim, Norway, I now reside in the breathtaking Lofoten Islands. My passion for the outdoors fuels my love for climbing, skiing, and free diving. Explore my journey as I blend technology, creativity, and adventure
